entry.sentence: \*\*\* Nobody knew who had given the name Windhome to the castle of the Dukes Young .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (JJ \*\*\*) (NN Nobody)) (VP (VBD knew) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN given) (NP (DT the) (NN name)) (NP (NP (NNP Windhome)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN castle)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NNP Dukes) (NNP Young))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: amod(Nobody-2, \*\*\*-1) nsubj(knew-3, Nobody-2) root(ROOT-0, knew-3) nsubj(given-6, who-4) aux(given-6, had-5) ccomp(knew-3, given-6) det(name-8, the-7) iobj(given-6, name-8) dobj(given-6, Windhome-9) det(castle-12, the-11) prep_to(Windhome-9, castle-12) det(Young-16, the-14) nn(Young-16, Dukes-15) prep_of(castle-12, Young-16)

entry.sentence: Even in the family chronicle one searched for it in vain .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (ADVP (RB Even)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN family) (NN chronicle))) (NP (PRP one)) (VP (VBD searched) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP it))) (PP (IN in) (NP (JJ vain)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(searched-7, Even-1) det(chronicle-5, the-3) nn(chronicle-5, family-4) prep_in(searched-7, chronicle-5) nsubj(searched-7, one-6) root(ROOT-0, searched-7) prep_for(searched-7, it-9) prep_in(searched-7, vain-11)

entry.sentence: House of the Wind - it was a modest name compared to that of other castles in Ireland .
entry.parse: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NP (NNP House)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NN Wind)))) (: -) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ modest) (NN name)) (PP (VBN compared) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT that)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (JJ other) (NNS castles)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NNP Ireland))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: root(ROOT-0, House-1) det(Wind-4, the-3) prep_of(House-1, Wind-4) nsubj(name-10, it-6) cop(name-10, was-7) det(name-10, a-8) amod(name-10, modest-9) dep(House-1, name-10) prepc_compared_to(name-10, to-12) pobj(name-10, that-13) amod(castles-16, other-15) prep_of(that-13, castles-16) prep_in(castles-16, Ireland-18)

entry.sentence: But also the Youngs of Windhome had always been modest .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC But) (ADVP (RB also)) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNPS Youngs)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNP Windhome)))) (VP (VBD had) (ADVP (RB always)) (VP (VBN been) (ADJP (JJ modest)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: cc(modest-10, But-1) advmod(modest-10, also-2) det(Youngs-4, the-3) nsubj(modest-10, Youngs-4) prep_of(Youngs-4, Windhome-6) aux(modest-10, had-7) advmod(modest-10, always-8) cop(modest-10, been-9) root(ROOT-0, modest-10)

entry.sentence: The sons of the Youngs had been honest fighters for their fatherland , clergymen , scientists and lords of the manor .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NNS sons)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NNPS Youngs)))) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN been) (NP (NP (JJ honest) (NNS fighters)) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP$ their) (NN fatherland) (, ,) (NN clergymen) (, ,) (NNS scientists) (CC and) (NNS lords))) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NN manor)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(sons-2, The-1) nsubj(fighters-9, sons-2) det(Youngs-5, the-4) prep_of(sons-2, Youngs-5) aux(fighters-9, had-6) cop(fighters-9, been-7) amod(fighters-9, honest-8) root(ROOT-0, fighters-9) poss(fatherland-12, their-11) prep_for(fighters-9, fatherland-12) prep_for(fighters-9, clergymen-14) conj_and(fatherland-12, clergymen-14) prep_for(fighters-9, scientists-16) conj_and(fatherland-12, scientists-16) prep_for(fighters-9, lords-18) conj_and(fatherland-12, lords-18) det(manor-21, the-20) prep_of(fighters-9, manor-21)
